Summary: quite bright like a close planet
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Chico
There were no other sightings in Chico on or around November 30th 1977
divs: sighting detailsi saw the object out my kitchen window for at least a week. thought it was a close planet. then one evening my neighbor and i went to a meeting where a group was lecturing on ufos. a man in the audience was very rude, cat-calling, whistling, etc. i turned to glare at him, my thought was that he looked strange. my friend also turned later and commented how strange he looked. to our surprise he was called up onto the platform and was part of the group. one spoke of a mother ship and its location. i told my friend that i see that every evening and it is just a big planet. i would show her when we got home. after the lecture everyone was taken out doors and was shown what they said were ufos. i saw nothing but stars and said so. the strange looking young man decided to talk to my friend and me later inside. he was a nice looking red head w\freckles. he started telling us what they were doing here, but when he switched from saying "they" are doing such and such and said "we are doing" etc. when he did that i believe my mouth dropped open and my brain shut off. could not come up with the questions i now wished i had asked. from what he told us it sounded like a minor scientific excursion. as in gathering plant life, etc. when we got home i started to show my friend the "planet". it was not there and i haven't seen it since. thinking about the young man all these years trying to know what was different about him. the only thing i can come up with is perhaps his skin texture may have been the difference. this happened 30 plus years ago. i have never have been able to talk to anyone about it. that is anyone that might have answer for me. i hope you can shed some light on what we experienced. i have never forgotten this young man. sincerely, jd
